title: Examples of Point and Nonpoint Sources

content.prompt: Which of the following examples includes both a point and a nonpoint source of pollution?

choices.label: A factory smokestack and a sewage overflow
Runoff from city streets and pesticides from agricultural fields
Waste from animal feedlots and sediment from construction sites
Fertilizer from suburban lawns and wastewater from a water treatment plant

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
